results.name: The Holy Radiant Maze - Hololive ID Fan Game

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor (Intel Core i5 and up)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10, 11, or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel 15 and above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 77 series or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
